name: Lead Angular Developer
description:
FxPro is a leading global broker, providing first class financial services and top-quality execution. We develop mobile banking, investments, business services, trading services and projects.

Our employees grow up to heads of the direction, product experts and improve professionally: growth depends on the result, not on experience. Those who are ready for big challenges can join the international team and put an impact to growth hacking

Eager to hire talented individuals who can perform and excel in a dynamic and innovative working environment!

Now we are looking for Lead Angular Developer.

You will be responsible for:

  • Design and develop flexible front-end solutions within the current infrastructure.
  • Collaborate with involved teams during design, development, and release process.
  • Develop Singe-page applications using cutting-edge web technologies.
  • Proactively investigate issues and offer technical improvements for the applications.
  • Perform code reviews for other team members.

Requirements:

  • 5+ years of continuous development as a Front-End Developer.
  • Excellent command of the English language.
  • Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or any other related field.
  • Solid knowledge of SPA Framework (preferably Angular 2.0 +).
  • Experience with сlient-side and back-end design patterns.
  • Understanding of Git version control software, RESTful web services, and features of Typescript.
  • Familiarity with CI/CD process, tools, and code review procedure.
  • Knowledge of .Net Framework and OOP/SOLID is an advantage.
  • Ability to study and apply up-to-date technologies to improve company process/product.
  • Hands-on Agile Software Development approach.

We provide:

  • Competitive salary including a 13th salary
  • Hybrid work schedule
  • Relocation package (if applicable)
  • ‍‍Visa arrangements for the employee and family members (if applicable)
  • Medical and life insurance
  • ⏏Provident fund
  • Free meals and beverages at the in-house cafeteria
  • In-house gym with a personal trainer
  • ✅Discount card for several services and products.
